reason: The market is currently in a re-accumulation phase, balancing macro uncertainties from the upcoming Fed rate decision minutes and recent liquidity events (Ether's $540M sell wave) against strong fundamental signals. While Ether has shown resilience by steadying and outperforming, and corporate news (Metaplanet, Animoca) indicates underlying sector growth and regulatory clarity, the impending Fed decision introduces significant volatility risk. The headline about a firm surviving an $8,000 Bitcoin price point, though a stress test, subtly underscores the potential for extreme downside scenarios, increasing perceived risk. Prudent observation of market liquidity and macro data is advised.
headlines: Hive, Riot earnings reports, Fed rate-decision minutes: Crypto Week Ahead
Metaplanet operating profit to rise 81% in 2026 after soaring 17-fold last year on options writing
Animoca Brands clears major regulatory hurdle with new Dubai license
Ether steadies after $540 million sell wave to outperform wider crypto market
Strategy says it can survive even if bitcoin drops to $8,000 and will 'equitize' debt
